items.sentence: Tom has some very important things he needs to get done by 2:30.
My son's short attention span is causing him problems at school.
Tom spends a lot of time at work, but not a lot of time working.
Tom said that he thought that it wouldn't be any fun to do that.
What kind of music do you usually listen to when you're driving?
I'm sorry to be so late. The meeting completely slipped my mind.
It's been a long time since Tom and I've done anything together.
Tom and Mary probably aren't as old as everyone thinks they are.
At first, I had no intention of taking over the family business.
I certainly had no idea that Tom was planning to move to Boston.
